node.text_en:
ğŸ”” Official Website

ğŸ—“ 7.11 (Sat), 7.12 (Sun) 9am - 9pm, some stations have different opening hours.
ğŸ› You can vote at any station in your LegCo 2020 district (not necessarily in your own 2019 DC Election constituency)
1ï¸âƒ£ Bring your own smartphone, all voters will cast their vote through official website, there's no need to install any mobile app.
2ï¸âƒ£ Provide the following documents to the station staff:
(a) HKID
(b) Address proof (issued within the last 3 months) or valid poll card of past elections
(c) Screenshot of digital ballot
For details please refer to the official website
During the voting process you will need to state if you are voter for Functional constituency. If you are voter under District Council (Second), ie you are not voter of Functional constituency (eg Health Services), please select "No" for the question.
Busy stations: Sheung Shui Station, Fanling Station, Taipo Centre Jocky Club Betting Branch, Jade Plaza Shopping Centre
Voters can only vote at the following stations, they can also cast their district vote there without heading to another voting stations. Result is reference only.
